PORT.description: Port for the server to listen on

ECHO_HOST.description: Hostname or IP of echo gRPC service

LEGACY_GRAPHQL_URL.description: Absolute URL of Magento Core GraphQL endpoint

ADOBE_IO_NAMESPACE.description: Namespace to query for Adobe I/O extension packages

ADOBE_IO_HOST.description: Hostname or IP of Adobe I/O

IO_API_KEY.description: API Key used to authenticate with Adobe I/O Runtime

IO_PACKAGES.description: A comma-delimited list of Adobe I/O GraphQL Extension packages to enable
